metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4931 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
epan/proto.c in Wireshark 1.8.x before 1.8.9 and 1.10.x before 1.10.1allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (loop) via a craftedpacket that is not properly handled by the GSM RR dissector.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.10.6-1
libwireshark3 - 1.10.6-1
libwiretap3 - 1.10.6-1
libwsutil3 - 1.10.6-1
tshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark-common - 1.10.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.6-1').
